quote: Reading is like diving into an ocean of an alternate world, away from your real world, where in spite of going though the pain and pleasure of the characters, you remain a witness, unscathed.
quote_letters: READING IS LIKE DIVING INTO AN OCEAN OF AN ALTERNATE WORLD AWAY FROM YOUR REAL WORLD WHERE IN SPITE OF GOING THOUGH THE PAIN AND PLEASURE OF THE CHARACTERS YOU REMAIN A WITNESS UNSCATHED
